title: Sakvithi gave tuition in India
content: Daily News – Sarath MALALASEKERA – (Pix by Derana TV) A Senior Police officer directing investigations into the arrest of Sakvithi Ranasinghe had deployed four special police teams to conduct investigations in Sri Lanka.
